oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copy print of a photograph taken at a Confederate Reunion at the Meigs County Courthouse. Featured in the center of the photograph on the first row behind the baby is Col. George Washington McKenzie, 5th Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA. Visible in the photograph in the back is the flag of the 26th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. A partially furled Confederate flag is on the pole at center, while a US flag is seen on a pole to the rear and another Confederate flag is seen on the left.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: McKenzie, George Washington (1818-1907)
